title: Artmebo
description: A dynamic art portfolio built with JavaScript, showcasing a curated collection of original drawings across diverse styles and themes. This project highlights my artistic range and technical skills.

title: GptClone
description: A simple ChatGPT clone project that emulates basic conversational AI functionality. It allows for interactive dialogues and showcases fundamental natural language processing capabilities.

title: Landing page
description: A Java desktop app for managing travel bookings, featuring intuitive tools for searching destinations and making reservations.

title: Climapp
description: A weather app made with JavaScript fetches data from an API like OpenWeatherMap and dynamically updates the interface. It includes an input for location and displays current weather conditions and forecasts.

title: RifVoyage
description: A Java desktop app for managing travel bookings, featuring intuitive tools for searching destinations and making reservations.
